quest.name: Stories We Tell
journal: Recent revelations weigh heavily on Alphinaud's mind.

As you and Alphinaud discuss your next course of action, you are reunited with the young girl from Stonesthrow. Having learned of your desire to find the merchant who recruited her parents, she sought you out in the hopes that you might lead her to them. Although he clearly has no desire to do so, Alphinaud offers to assist the girl with her search. Soon after you are contacted by Minfilia, who requests you return to the Rising Stones immediately. The situation in the Twelveswood has taken a turn for the worse, and you will likely be asked to intervene.

Minfilia is pleased to hear that you and Alphinaud are well, and states that she is ready to brief you on the latest threat. Inform her when you are ready so that she might summon the other Scions to the solar.
objectives: Speak with Minfilia at the Rising Stones.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I should be glad to know the truth, and yet...the thought that all this chaos was the product of one man's lust for power sickens me.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: How long do you think they intended to hide the existence of Omega from the Scions? That they even felt the need to do so is most troubling.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It would be in our best interests to learn more of the military activities in the disputed territories. You are, of course, the Scion best suited to this task, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname. Do take a moment to visit Maelstrom Commandthe Adders' Nestthe Hall of Flames and make inquiries at the earliest available opportunity.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It would be in our best interests to learn more of the military activities in the disputed territories. Fortunately, you are already well positioned to do so, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname. Pray keep us informed of any developments in Carteneau.

dialogue.name: GUARD01447
dialogue.text: (-Sultansworn Squire-)Begone, whelp! This is no place for children!

dialogue.name: ELE
dialogue.text: <sniffle> <sob> I'm...I'm sorry...

dialogue.name: ELE
dialogue.text: I... <sniffle> I was looking for you, missmister. You said you were looking for the man who left with my parents. <sob>

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: You know this girl?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So he visited Stonesthrow as well? I see.

dialogue.name: ELE
dialogue.text: Did you find the man? Were my parents with him?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: They were not, I am afraid.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...However, I can think of several places they might be. If you like, we can go and look for them together.

dialogue.name: ELE
dialogue.text: Really? You'll help me look, mister?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of course. But first, I must needs finish speaking with my friend. SheHe's telling me a secret, you see, so no one else is allowed to listen. Mayhap you could wait for me by that pillar over there? We require but a moment.

dialogue.name: ELE
dialogue.text: Okay, mister! I'll be waiting!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...I'll take her to the Quicksand. Mayhap Momodi will know what to do.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: <sigh> A legion of Garleans, an aether-starved primal─even dealing with an Ascian would be preferable to this charade.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Sometimes I fear Minfilia is too ambitious. We rush hither and yon in response to threats as they arise, without concern for the strain it places on our limited resources─and ourselves.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Mayhap the time has come for a change...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Forename, this is Minfilia. I know this is sudden, but I must ask you to return to Revenant's Toll with all due haste.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The situation in the Twelveswood has taken a turn for the worse. I will explain in detail once you arrive.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Twelveswood? Then the primal threat she spoke of before has been confirmed? I have received no reports of Ixali activity, which leaves...the sylphs?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Go, Forename. You know as well as I that the appearance of a primal takes precedence over all else.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Oh, and when you arrive, do inform the Antecedent that while I am grateful for her concern, she needn't fear for my safety. I am more than capable of protecting myself.

dialogue.name: MESSENGER01447
dialogue.text: I am come on behalf of the Elder Seedseer to petition the aid of your order. The Antecedent has been apprised of the situation.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: It is a relief to see you healthy and hale, Forename. The latest news from Ul'dah was most disturbing.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: ...Clearly, the only injury Alphinaud suffered was to his ego. Doubtless it will heal ere long.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The other Scions will need to be present for this meeting. If you are ready to begin, I will summon them now.
